channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 11:26 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 11:26 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 11:08 pm a alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 11:08 pm a alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
